actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 101-939, by Mr. Beilenson.

Rule provides for consideration of the conference report to H.R. 486. All points of order against the conference report and against its consideration are waived. The conference report shall be considered as having been read when called up for consideration.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 207.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The previous question was ordered without objection.
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Waiving certain points of order against consideration of the conference report on the bill (H.R. 486) to amend the Defense Production Act of 1950 to revitalize the defense industrial base of the United States, and for other purposes, and against its consideration.

summary.text: Waives points of order against the consideration of the conference report on H.R. 486 (defense production).

titles.title: Waiving certain points of order against consideration of the conference report on the bill (H.R. 486) to amend the Defense Production Act of 1950 to revitalize the defense industrial base of the United States, and for other purposes, and against its consideration.
